issue.message: Basic auth security scheme description lacks important information about API key usage

repairs.action_taken: Updated description to include: 'You can access this resource via basic auth. Important - An API key can be used as a password.'

issue.message: Server URL should use variables for domain customization instead of static placeholder

repairs.action_taken: Changed server URL from 'https://your-domain.atlassian.net' to 'https://{your-domain}.atlassian.net' with variables definition
